Image Metadata Viewer

View EXIF and other metadata from images including camera settings, location, and more.

Drag and drop an image here, or click to select

Supported: JPEG, PNG, WebP, TIFF

Upload an image to view metadata

FAQ

Is my image sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser.

What metadata can be viewed?

You can view EXIF data including camera settings, GPS coordinates, date taken, and other embedded information.

Why don't I see metadata for some images?

Some images may not have embedded metadata, or the metadata may have been stripped during processing.
